 2021-04632021-06-01,  ,  AAFC,  CFIA,  ,  , 
ActHealth of Animals Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Health of Animals Regulations (Emergency Transit)
PrecisRegulations Amending the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS (Emergency Transit) in order to allow regulated animals to transit through Canada and the United States during emergency situations accompanied by a simplified export certificate, without requiring owners to obtain an import permit and/or meet the requirements of the Import Reference Document.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0114 Publication Date: 2021-06-09
AttachmentsAttachment
